sites.name: GALGJE!
sites.hover: Galgje is dutch for hangman! Click here to click this classic (but kinda grim) game.

sites.name: WOORDZOEKER
sites.hover: Woordzoeker is dutch for word search! Find the words in a grid of seemingly random characters.

sites.name: MOLAR MASS
sites.hover: A tool for everyone sick of manually having to look up the molar mass of chemical formulas! Certainly useful for every chemistry student or nerd.

sites.name: ZERO ADDER
sites.hover: This is a tool for conversion between SI prefixes, as well as between imperial and metric units. My first creation with very limited uses, but I still love it.
